author: @apooyosucks
original_text:
The detachable mic *doesn't work as a separate mic* . From what I heard in forums, it only works for answering/making calls. So it's false advertising calling a "gaming" headset in where microphones are very much needed in voice chatting other players or for commentary.

6/10 for me. Pretty disappointed to be honest.

At least the sound quality is pretty decent. And the volume scroll wheel feature is pretty neat.
